divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside at About 2Am or so to make sure my car was locked, And I seen this weird blue glowing orb , shooting across the sky towards a stationary White orb and a Weird Redish glowing orb and then if that wasnt weird I watched the Blue orb shoot off something that look like a beam or something at the red orb then the red orb kinda shot off for abt 30 secs and the white or turned a redish color all about the same time and the blue and red or started what looked like shooting lights at each other after about 1 minute of this i watched the sky in the direction kinda flash like thunder for abt 5 seconds and these things were moving in weird directions stopping and then changing direction, after the flashing the red orb was gone and a second orb appeared it was red also i assume it was the first red orb that dissapeared. and they both shot off toward the NE , all of this sorta lasted id say 5 minutes. was kinda like a Dogfight.
Summary: Watch a Weird Dogfight of Sorts
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Paris
There were no other sightings in Paris on or around September 9th 2011
